Dear @Shada Shehadeh <mailto:s.shehadeh@aszarchitetti.com> , @Muhammad Shoaib <mailto:Muhammad.Shoaib@decoemirates.com> ,

 

PFB remarks from freight forwarder and do the needful:

 

Please share the complete details as per the below mail. Have attached the form for your reference.

 

<<< 

Ref.to below, In case if you willing to conduct Joint survey, Pls provide following item/s in order to check with our HQ Team

and advise possibility of participating for the same from our end….

 

Required Cargo Claim Documents

-       Cargo Claim Notice in the attached form :

-       Commercial invoice :

-       Packing list :

-       Photos evidencing cargo damage :

-       Proof that loss/damage occurred during KMTC’s responsibility period :

-       Any other relevant supporting documents :

-       Cargo Insured or Not :

(a) If cargo is insured : to claim your cargo insurer and insurer may file subrogation claim against KMTC  after settling the claim. Sent the details to us.

b) If cargo is uninsured: to submit claim documents directly us in order to check with our  claim department.

-       Joint surveyor details…./Name & Mobile # etc….+ date and location for inspection :

Remarks :

 

 "Please note: As per our bill of lading terms and Article 804 of the Korean Commercial Act, if written notice of damage is not given within 3 days after cargo delivery, the cargo is presumed to have been delivered in good condition.  Therefore, please submit your notification within 3  days of receiving the cargo."

 

>>> 

 

 

Thanks,

 

 

ASAAM TAMBE​​​​

COORDINATOR ‑ SHIPPING

Dear All,

 

Unfortunately, the containers are not yet discharged.

I have added this shipment for tomorrow’s i.e. 6th November delivery hoping that the containers may get discharged soon and ready for delivery anytime.

Please accept this shipment whenever the containers get ready for delivery irrespective of the time considering this as a top priority shipment.

 

Also, this shipment needs to be delivered to Dubai Mall as soon as it gets in warehouse on top priority considering it as cross dock as per Rimaz’s instruction.

 

Package details:

1 x 20 ft container

Dear @Rimaz Algadoumi <mailto:Rimaz.Algadoumi@chalhoub.com> , @Kevin Chalhoub <mailto:Kevin.Chalhoub@chalhoub.com> ,

 

PFB comments from freight forwarder:

 

Shipper was ready to load on 08/Oct, first available vessel was on 12/Oct , which was blank sailing. Now 18/Oct vessel we have planned to load. We checked other vessels, nothing is available. Unfortunately, the earliest available vessel was scheduled for 12th October, but due to a blank sailing on that date, the next available option is the vessel departing on 18th October.

 

We have explored all possible alternatives, but unfortunately, no other vessels are available before 8th Oct. Blank sailings are an industry-wide issue where scheduled sailings are canceled due to factors such as low demand or operational constraints by the carriers.

Blank sailings are an industry-wide issue where scheduled sailings are canceled due to factors such as low demand or operational constraints by the carriers. In this case, it has affected our ability to secure an earlier booking.

 

Please rest assured that we are monitoring the situation closely and will prioritize your shipment on the next available vessel. We are also looking at all possible options to minimize further impact.

 

Thanks,

 

 

 

ASAAM TAMBE​​​​

COORDINATOR ‑ SHIPPING

REAL FZE

DUBAI

Dubai 

United Arab Emirates

Thank you

 

Eduardo Gouveia.

Dear @Shada Shehadeh <mailto:s.shehadeh@aszarchitetti.com> , @Muhammad Shoaib <mailto:Muhammad.Shoaib@decoemirates.com> ,

 

PFB remarks from freight forwarder and do the needful:

 

Please share the complete details as per the below mail. Have attached the form for your reference.

 

<<< 

Ref.to below, In case if you willing to conduct Joint survey, Pls provide following item/s in order to check with our HQ Team

and advise possibility of participating for the same from our end….

 

Required Cargo Claim Documents

-       Cargo Claim Notice in the attached form :

-       Commercial invoice :

-       Packing list :

-       Photos evidencing cargo damage :

-       Proof that loss/damage occurred during KMTC’s responsibility period :

-       Any other relevant supporting documents :

-       Cargo Insured or Not :

(a) If cargo is insured : to claim your cargo insurer and insurer may file subrogation claim against KMTC  after settling the claim. Sent the details to us.

b) If cargo is uninsured: to submit claim documents directly us in order to check with our  claim department.

-       Joint surveyor details…./Name & Mobile # etc….+ date and location for inspection :

Remarks :

 

 "Please note: As per our bill of lading terms and Article 804 of the Korean Commercial Act, if written notice of damage is not given within 3 days after cargo delivery, the cargo is presumed to have been delivered in good condition.

Dear All,

 

Unfortunately, the containers are not yet discharged.

I have added this shipment for tomorrow’s i.e. 6th November delivery hoping that the containers may get discharged soon and ready for delivery anytime.

Please accept this shipment whenever the containers get ready for delivery irrespective of the time considering this as a top priority shipment.

 

Also, this shipment needs to be delivered to Dubai Mall as soon as it gets in warehouse on top priority considering it as cross dock as per Rimaz’s instruction.

 

Package details:

1 x 20 ft container

1 x 40 ft container

Total 35 pallets

Gross weight 9080kg

Total CBM is 67.89

 

Appointment number is 0020108972.

 

Thanks for you support in advance 😊

TOP PRIORITY

 

Please be informed that this shipment is arrive and cleared today.

We are waiting for the containers to get discharged for delivery.

We count on your support to accept this shipment delivery by tomorrow, if the containers get discharged at any time. Please consider this as a special case.

 

If the container is not discharged till tomorrow evening, please accept it for 6th November delivery.

 

This shipment needs to be delivered to Dubai Mall as soon as it gets in warehouse on top priority considering it as cross dock as per Rimaz’s instruction.

 

Package details:

1 x 20 ft container

1 x 40 ft container

Total 35 pallets

Gross weight 9080kg

Total CBM is 67.89

 

 

Thanks,

 

 

 

ASAAM TAMBE​​​​

DUBAI

Dear @Rimaz Algadoumi <mailto:Rimaz.Algadoumi@chalhoub.com> , @Kevin Chalhoub <mailto:Kevin.Chalhoub@chalhoub.com> ,

 

PFB comments from freight forwarder:

 

Shipper was ready to load on 08/Oct, first available vessel was on 12/Oct , which was blank sailing. Now 18/Oct vessel we have planned to load. We checked other vessels, nothing is available. Unfortunately, the earliest available vessel was scheduled for 12th October, but due to a blank sailing on that date, the next available option is the vessel departing on 18th October.

 

We have explored all possible alternatives, but unfortunately, no other vessels are available before 8th Oct. Blank sailings are an industry-wide issue where scheduled sailings are canceled due to factors such as low demand or operational constraints by the carriers.

Thanks,

 

 

 

ASAAM TAMBE​​​​

Subject: Dubai Mall new fixtures pick up from Sentech

 

Hi Asaam,

 

We will have the fixtures of the Dubai Mall new store getting ready in the upcoming weeks. Below is the estimation on the number of containers and pick up address/contact details. The containers have to be delivered to Deco Emirates warehouse. We have to coordinate with Kristian Fell for delivery.

 

Please let know the estimated costs for our budget update.

 

Dubai mall

1 x 40'HQ

1 x 20'GP

 

Pick up address:

Zhili Furniture Co., Ltd.

No. 12, Ridong Road, Houjie Town, Dongguan City, Guangdong, China 523960

 

Contact person and details:

Ms. Janice Lam

Ph: (852) 29470850

Email: Janicelam@sentech.com.hk <mailto:Janicelam@sentech.com.hk> 

 

 

Delivery address:

 

Kristian.Fel@decoemirates.com <mailto:Kristian.Fel@decoemirates.com> 

 

Direct: +97148854660 Ext: 212

 

Fax     +971 4 8854305

 

Mobile +971 50 4560069

​
​
​Deco Emirates LLC

​​​P.O. Box 19238

Dubai 

United Arab Emirates

 

Let me know if any questions.

 

Thank you

 

Eduardo Gouveia.

Subject: RE: AE_OI145782 Dubai Mall new fixtures pick up from Sentech

Dear All,

 

Unfortunately, the containers are not yet discharged.

I have added this shipment for tomorrow’s i.e. 6th November delivery hoping that the containers may get discharged soon and ready for delivery anytime.

Please accept this shipment whenever the containers get ready for delivery irrespective of the time considering this as a top priority shipment.

 

Also, this shipment needs to be delivered to Dubai Mall as soon as it gets in warehouse on top priority considering it as cross dock as per Rimaz’s instruction.

 

Package details:

1 x 20 ft container

1 x 40 ft container

Total 35 pallets

Gross weight 9080kg

Total CBM is 67.89

 

Appointment number is 0020108972.

 

Thanks for you support in advance 😊

 

Regards,

 

 

ASAAM TAMBE​​​​

Dear @Rimaz Algadoumi <mailto:Rimaz.Algadoumi@chalhoub.com> , @Kevin Chalhoub <mailto:Kevin.Chalhoub@chalhoub.com> ,

 

PFB comments from freight forwarder:

 

Shipper was ready to load on 08/Oct, first available vessel was on 12/Oct , which was blank sailing. Now 18/Oct vessel we have planned to load. We checked other vessels, nothing is available. Unfortunately, the earliest available vessel was scheduled for 12th October, but due to a blank sailing on that date, the next available option is the vessel departing on 18th October.

 

We have explored all possible alternatives, but unfortunately, no other vessels are available before 8th Oct. Blank sailings are an industry-wide issue where scheduled sailings are canceled due to factors such as low demand or operational constraints by the carriers.

Please rest assured that we are monitoring the situation closely and will prioritize your shipment on the next available vessel. We are also looking at all possible options to minimize further impact.

 

Thanks,

 

 

 

ASAAM TAMBE​​​​

The containers have to be delivered to Deco Emirates warehouse. We have to coordinate with Kristian Fell for delivery.

Dubai mall

1 x 40'HQ

1 x 20'GP

​

​Deco Emirates LLC

​​​P.O. Box 19238

Dubai 

United Arab Emirates

 

Let me know if any questions.

 

Thank you

 

Eduardo Gouveia.

Dear @Shada Shehadeh <mailto:s.shehadeh@aszarchitetti.com> , @Muhammad Shoaib <mailto:Muhammad.Shoaib@decoemirates.com> ,

 

PFB remarks from freight forwarder and do the needful:

 

Please share the complete details as per the below mail. Have attached the form for your reference.

 

<<< 

Ref.to below, In case if you willing to conduct Joint survey, Pls provide following item/s in order to check with our HQ Team

and advise possibility of participating for the same from our end….

 

Required Cargo Claim Documents

-       Cargo Claim Notice in the attached form :

-       Commercial invoice :

-       Packing list :

-       Photos evidencing cargo damage :

-       Proof that loss/damage occurred during KMTC’s responsibility period :

-       Any other relevant supporting documents :

-       Cargo Insured or Not :

(a) If cargo is insured : to claim your cargo insurer and insurer may file subrogation claim against KMTC  after settling the claim. Sent the details to us.

b) If cargo is uninsured: to submit claim documents directly us in order to check with our  claim department.

-       Joint surveyor details…./Name & Mobile # etc….+ date and location for inspection :

Remarks :

 

 "Please note: As per our bill of lading terms and Article 804 of the Korean Commercial Act, if written notice of damage is not given within 3 days after cargo delivery, the cargo is presumed to have been delivered in good condition.  Therefore, please submit your notification within 3  days of receiving the cargo."

 

>>> 

 

 

Thanks,

 

 

ASAAM TAMBE​​​​

COORDINATOR ‑ SHIPPING
